Installation:
The downloaded file (an image in a format iso), write down on a clean, high-quality DVD disk using specialized programs: Alcohol 120%, NERO, UltraISO, etc., recommended speed when recording from x2 to x8. Format the hard drive on which to install the OS (this is done in the process)
